body_html: You can change this for your local build by changing https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L269 before calling FULL_CAFFE2=1 setup.py install. setuptools doesn't make it easy to propogate flags, so the binaries will probably not be built by default in the near future.
body_text: You can change this for your local build by changing https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L269  before calling FULL_CAFFE2=1 setup.py install. setuptools doesn't make it easy to propogate flags, so the binaries will probably not be built by default in the near future.
body: You can change this for your local build by changing https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh#L269  before calling `FULL_CAFFE2=1 setup.py install`. setuptools doesn't make it easy to propogate flags, so the binaries will probably not be built by default in the near future.
